title: No Hextech Keys?
body: I know they're supposed to be rare, but I didn't get one in like..half a year? maybe im exxagerating but I swear it's been ages...is this normal? or...

replies.body: You can only get 12 key fragments in a four week period from winning matches. You might have hit an unlucky streak or need to win more matches, but make sure to check over the details on the [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).
